header.title: The Secret of the Wicca Jar
header.category: Esotericism, Occultism, Magick, Law of Attraction

central_thesis: The core thesis is that financial abundance can be attracted not solely through conventional physical labor but also through intentional magical practice, specifically utilizing a 'Wicca Jar' and a complementary spell. This system operates primarily on the principles of the Law of Attraction and sympathetic magic, aiming to cultivate a constant awareness and energetic resonance with money to manifest wealth effortlessly.

structure_content.chapter_title: Money doesn't have to be earned physically.
structure_content.summary: This section challenges the conventional belief that money is solely acquired through labor, introducing the Law of Attraction as the underlying principle for attracting wealth. It asserts that 'like attracts like,' implying that a focus on money and success will naturally draw more of it, making wealth acquisition an act of 'willing it' rather than mere physical exertion.

structure_content.chapter_title: I want to tell you about the concept of a Wicca Jar.
structure_content.summary: The author introduces the 'Wicca Jar' as a primary tool for effortless money attraction. Detailed instructions are provided for its creation: a clean glass jar (or bowl) filled three-quarters with high-value coins (quarters preferred) and pure natural water (rainwater, ocean, spring). The emphasis is on visibility and purity of ingredients to enhance its magnetic effect.

structure_content.chapter_title: The purpose of putting the jar in a prominent place is three-fold.
structure_content.summary: This section elaborates on the psychological and energetic functions of the Wicca Jar's placement. Its prominent display serves to maintain the practitioner's constant awareness of money, encourage contributions from others (reinforcing the 'money attracts money' principle), and cultivate a positive 'love for money,' thereby aligning the practitioner's subconscious with abundance.

While magical, the system encourages practical engagement with finance. It suggests that gaining knowledge about money and investing (e.g., consulting stockbrokers, reading financial papers) can enhance the efficacy of the money-attracting spell. This integration of mundane learning with magical intent is presented as a way to refine intuition and make informed decisions that align with magical aspirations. Color correspondences for wealth attraction (gold and purple) are also noted.

structure_content.chapter_title: For your Spell, gather these ingredients:
structure_content.summary: A comprehensive list of materials for the main money-attracting spell is provided, including specific types and quantities of items. Key ingredients include gold candles, natural gold/gems (jade, yellow sapphire, emerald), gold coins, Patchouli incense, gold-colored flowers, a success-oriented image (e.g., zodiac signs like Leo, or an influential wealthy figure), a blood-red cloth, and optionally, the prepared Wicca Jar(s).

structure_content.chapter_title: Spell Casting Instructions (implicit chapter title based on content)
structure_content.summary: Detailed instructions for executing the money-attracting spell are given. This involves selecting a full moon phase, performing the ritual outdoors at complete darkness, laying out the red cloth, arranging candles, flowers, and the success image. The practitioner then holds specific stones and gold pieces, concentrates on attracting wealth, and chants a two-part invocation beginning with 'Ohm' to manifest financial abundance. Fervor is highlighted as crucial for efficacy.

structure_content.chapter_title: Conclusion (implicit chapter title based on content)
structure_content.summary: The text concludes by emphasizing the importance of fervent belief and intention, akin to prayer, for the spell to deeply permeate the practitioner's being. After the ritual, a brief meditation is suggested, with the understanding that the chant's influence endures for months. The ongoing role of the Wicca Jar is reiterated as a perpetual reminder and attractor of money, reinforcing the practitioner's connection to wealth energy.

key_concepts.definition: A physical focal point for attracting money, consisting of a clean glass vessel filled with coins and pure natural water. Its purpose is to create a tangible representation of accumulated wealth and an energetic magnet for further financial inflow, operating on sympathetic principles.

The fundamental magical principle posited in the text, stating that 'like attracts like.' In this context, focusing on and surrounding oneself with symbols of money and abundance will energetically draw more wealth into one's life. It underpins both the Wicca Jar and the spell.

A specific location within the home, identified as the 'far left rear,' where wealth energy is believed to naturally 'abide.' Placing a Wicca Jar in this area is recommended to maximize its effectiveness in attracting financial abundance.

The intensity of emotional and spiritual engagement during the magical operation. The text emphasizes that the more fervent the practitioner, the more effective the spell will be, indicating a key component of successful manifestation through willpower and belief.

A concept suggesting that money, like water, congregates and flows. Observing phenomena like coins in public fountains illustrates how money 'attracts' more money, a principle the Wicca Jar and spell aim to harness and replicate within the practitioner's sphere.

practical_system.description: The practical system outlined is a two-pronged approach to financial abundance, combining the ongoing, passive attraction of the 'Wicca Jar' with an active, ritualistic 'Money Attracting Spell.' The Wicca Jar acts as a perpetual energetic anchor for wealth, while the spell provides a potent, focused burst of intention and sympathetic magic to magnetize money. Both components are designed to cultivate a mindset of abundance and leverage the Law of Attraction.
tools: Pure, natural water (rainwater, ocean water, spring water)
Natural gold, jade, yellow sapphire, or emerald
Gold flowers (gold color, speckled or painted)
Picture representing success (lion, eagle, bull, man representing zodiac signs like Leo/Scorpio/Taurus/Aquarius, or an inspirational wealthy figure)
rituals: **Wicca Jar Creation & Placement**: Obtain a clean glass jar (or bowl). Fill it three-quarters with high-value coins (quarters are preferred). Add pure, natural water (rainwater, ocean, or spring water). Display the jar prominently in the home, ideally in high-traffic areas like the dining table or kitchen counter, near the bed, or specifically in the 'far left rear' of the home (identified as the wealth energy area). The jar is to be maintained as an ongoing symbol and attractor of money.

**Money Attracting Spell**: This ritual is performed during a full moon, preferably outdoors and at complete darkness. The practitioner lays out a blood-red cloth as the ritual space. Gold candles are placed, along with gold-colored flowers (preferably in vases with water) and a picture symbolizing success (e.g., a lion, eagle, bull, or an image of a wealthy, successful person). The practitioner holds precious stones (gold, jade, yellow sapphire, emerald) in one hand and gold coins in the other, concentrating on attracting wealth from existing resources. The ritual culminates in a quiet, elongated 'Ohm' followed by a two-part chant: 'YOU ARE MINE / JOY IN THE GOLD BUDS / PASSION IN THE GREEN LEAVES / DO NOT DELAY / YOU ARE LATE' and 'ABUNDANCE BE MINE / WHAT I ASK IS MY CHOICE / HEAR MY CALL AND OBEY / THUS IT SHALL BE / BE ONE WITH ME'. Fervor is crucial during the chanting. After the spell, a few minutes of meditation are recommended, and items are collected.

relevant_quotes.text: Life teaches us that money doesn't come out of thin air. You must exert energy, time, and physical labor to get a salary. It's the way the world works. There is no such thing as a free lunch. However, that's not exactly true...
The Law of Attraction is the power that is at work here. Like attracts like. Money attracts more money.

There is something about water that is universal. It calms. It heals. It restores. People have positive associations with it and feel the need to reciprocate. The money and water combine to be effective in attracting money to you.

The purpose of putting the jar in a prominent place is three-fold. First, it will make you always aware of money. ... The second purpose is to allow people to fill the jar to the top. ... A third goal of the Wicca Jar is to obtain a love for money.

Note: spells using different colors will perform differently. Which colors do you think will attract money? While green and even silver are good colors to use because they are representative of money, gold is the most powerful. I suggest you use it. Purple is the color of royalty and is also a very strong attraction of wealth.
YOU ARE MINE / JOY IN THE GOLD BUDS / PASSION IN THE GREEN LEAVES / DO NOT DELAY / YOU ARE LATE
ABUNDANCE BE MINE / WHAT I ASK IS MY CHOICE / HEAR MY CALL AND OBEY / THUS IT SHALL BE / BE ONE WITH ME

critical_analysis.relevance: This work is highly relevant within modern practical esotericism, offering a simplified and accessible system for prosperity magic that blends traditional folk magic elements (jar spells, sympathetic correspondences of water, coins, and colors) with contemporary New Thought and Law of Attraction principles. It provides a direct, operative approach to financial manifestation, emphasizing both ritual action and psychological conditioning. The inclusion of 'Donald Trump is an icon!' for success imagery firmly places it within a very modern, pop-culture informed magical context, making it distinct from older, more formally structured grimoire traditions. It exemplifies how magical practice adapts to current cultural touchstones and personal definitions of success.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The target audience includes individuals new to magical practice, those seeking practical and easy-to-implement spells for financial abundance, practitioners of modern witchcraft or New Age spirituality interested in wealth manifestation, and followers of the Law of Attraction looking to integrate ritualistic components into their practice. Its accessible language and clear instructions make it suitable for those without extensive prior occult knowledge.
